remarks: If there is a cofinal map from ` B ` to ` A ` and another from ` C ` to ` A ` , then there is also a cofinal map from ` C ` to ` B ` . Proposition 11.9 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 102.  A limited form of transitivity for the "cof" relation.  This is really a lemma for ~ cfcof .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Mar-2013.)
